website_summaries.verdict: A weighted base and finished bottom keep this stand-up garbage bag firmly in place on the floor of your car.
pros: Weighted base, so it won't tip with hard braking and tight turns
2-gallon capacity with narrow profile to fit in tight spaces
cons: Empty container can fold in on itself
Consider inserting cardboard panels from shipping box into sides

customer_reviews.title: Good size, stays in place, removable liner
customer_reviews.text: This trash bag is perfect for my 2001 Honda CRV. It is large enough to hold plenty of trash, stays in place thanks to the velcro on the bottom and has a nice, sturdy cover. Fits perfect in front of the tray console. My only suggestion would be to make the lid 4 sided. It does have velcro on the flap that overlaps, but the sides peak out. The little bungie bag on the front is perfect for holding my garage door opener. Overall very happy with this. Would but again, recommend if you are looking for something besides a tiny little trash can/bag.
customer_reviews.author: P  Pop

customer_reviews.title: Great product - gets used a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic addition to my SUV. Some pointers if u buy this: - Don't put ice cream or drink cups in there - it would pack the can very fast. Always take that kind of trash inside the house - The side walls have no frame so it closes like a purse. I glued 2 popicle sticks on each side. ** MANUFACTURER: PLEASE ADD SOME metal bars so it doesn't close. - Allow some velcro stickers so it stays in place. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: Function Does Not Meet Fashion in this case, but the units ARE completely functional.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both sizes. The small one has a "frame" that snaps into place and holds the piece so that it does not collapse. The larger one does not have the frame, and the sides tend to collapse. I made a cardboard frame so that the unit would not collapse. The lids on both the small size and the large size are ill fitting. Both lids are too large for the units, but they will still function well for the garbage to be collected. I also feel that the units are too expensive considering the lack of quality.
customer_reviews.author: KI

customer_reviews.title: Will do the job!
customer_reviews.text: A good quality item. I got the Large I purchased another brand but returned it. I recommend this. The weighted base is a great idea. I notice when inserting the weight the inner walls are cardboard. A couple of suggestions... make the flip lid close with magnets and not velcro. The end walls would benefit with extra support to keep it sturdy. A strap would be nice to tie it down. There is velcro strips on the bottom that would stop from sliding but not from tipping over. I do like this compared to others available.
customer_reviews.author: TQOR

customer_reviews.title: It Is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking all over for this perfect trash can! I am on my 3rd Toyota Sienna, and my last one had this type of trash can it. Since our daughter bought our 2nd van, we let her keep the trash can. So I thought my spouse got it at the Container store, but they didn’t carry it. Finally found it here. It is a perfect fit up front. With it being weighted at the bottom, it doesn’t tip over either. I HIGHLY recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Henry

customer_reviews.title: Been using for a few days and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new vehicle, a smaller vehicle for me, and I needed a trash can so tissues and straw wrappers didn't end up all over the floor. This fits beautifully on the rear center floor, directly between the back of the center console and the back seat. It secures nicely to the floor and it hasn't tipped over. I am using one the plastic bags from the grocery store as a liner to make emptying it a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Hecknauer

customer_reviews.title: Glad That I Chose This Trash Basket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this trash basket for my son to put in his new small-size SUV. I chose this one because of the weighted bottom/Velcro strips to hold it in place and the easy-wipe interior of the basket. We positioned it in the passenger floorboard space so that he could reach over to the basket easily. Riding in the passenger side of the vehicle, it has cut down on some of the legroom but not enough that makes it uncomfortable for me. It's worked out very well so far and it appears to be a good-quality item. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper - IA

customer_reviews.title: Changed my mind
customer_reviews.text: Last year I rated this as 3 stars because it wasn't big enough. I've changed my mind after having it for a year. It is perfect sized. It stays put well. It empty about fine. The reason it isn't 5 stars is because the flap doesn't really close. A minor gripe since the lid doesn't flap around or anything. And because the little metal struts that hold it in place (they snap in, it's hard to explain) push out through the fabric sheaths. Again, not a deal breaker. Bottom line: works well, big enough, stays put.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that’s Not floppy!
customer_reviews.text: This trashcan is awesome there’s Velcro on the bottom so it doesn’t move around on the floor of the car. A lot of these style trash cans are totally floppy which renders them useless in my opinion and I had to return many before I found this one, which has rigid metal edges all around the rim to keep its shape. It’s great
customer_reviews.author: Edc

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a trash can that does not fall over every time you turn a corner. This can does all it says it will do. Stays upright no matter how fast we turn the corner, holds everything including cups of soda, and is leak proof. We are very pleased with this product. We take several trips a year and use this trash can constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice auto trash can that fits a 5th generation 4runner.
customer_reviews.text: This trash can fits perfect on the back seat floor center hump of a 5th gen toyota 4runner. It has velcro on the bottom and a weighted bag that slides into a zippered pocket on the bottom. It appears to be a well built nylon container. I have OEM floor mats, so I will put some female adhesive velcro on the floor mat to keep it in place. Overall we are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping cars clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to any car! We always have trash in the car and I need somewhere to keep it, instead of the floor! This has a nice weight that goes on the bottom of the box. It also has a zipper to keep things in, or for when you are transporting it. It's leakproof, so that comes in handy just in case you have a little one that decides to get sick in the car. Fits nicely on the floor and in between seats. It's given a 4 stars because I wish it was just a TAD bit bigger. Otherwise, its a great addition if you want to keep your car clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lee

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: It is laughably small!! Though the product is pictured with what looks like a reasonable number of things in it, it is so small that it defies belief. There is a waterproof layer inside that does not go all the way to the bottom, so though you think you have all that cubic capacity, you probably have 3/4's of it...maybe and thats a big maybe 7/8's of it. So you have a fraction of the space which was already too small. I should have heeded another reviewers comments that if this is "XL" then I laugh at what the smaller sizes must be. I can't wait to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Skunky McFee

customer_reviews.title: Best car trash dispenser I’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: Love how roomy this is and that it stays put! I have it right next to the drivers seat so it’s very easily accessible. The cover is great to keep the trash out of sight and I like the little pocket for holding a small pack of Chlorox wipes.
customer_reviews.author: musiccat

customer_reviews.title: Favorite car trash solution so far
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution for my 2008 Prius. Fits in front of console just the right size. Velcro keeps it stable. Great location for snacks or trash. Convenient pocket on front and sturdy lid if needed. Looks nice. Keeps clutter to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Ivynana

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for organizing coffee and other items and they DON'T tip over!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to improve my driving trips and it works GREAT! I have a canvas tote bag I use to bring my coffee thermos, water, etc. from the house to work and when turning corners everything would tip and spill. So thought I would try this weighted organizer. Sure enough it does the trick perfectly and looks good, too. It is well constructed and durable. Recommend this product very highly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great car carrier/basket
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a small pack for quick picnic, and also works great as a receptacle for refuse inside vehicles. I keep mine in the backseat of my car, in the foot well, for easy access to place used items, which can later be transferred to a more appropriate container.
customer_reviews.author: Irish con carne

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Had :)
customer_reviews.text: This is very handy in my new (to me) RAV4. I had purchased a trash bag that hangs from the back of the seat for my last car, but I never cared for it. It was hard to access from the driver's side and didn't hold much. This one is so easy to use when placed behind the console and it big enough to put a box of Kleenex in one side and still have room for trash on the other. The weighted and velcro-type bottom keep it in place and easy to access. It is a great addition to my vehicle and keeps things neat and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Smyers

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Purchase of a Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trash receptacle in 2012, and I'm coming back to buy another in 2016. This thing has been awesome in my van! My old one is still structurally sound, but the inside lining is disgusting because my kids throw away everything from half-consumed milkshakes to chewing gum! I have wiped down the lining before, but I'm honestly just too lazy to really give it the scrubbing it deserves. I just bought a new van and decided that I want a nice, new trash receptacle to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Wilms

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this product because: (i) it does not stand up on its own (since it comes folded, the sides have folds that collapse when trying to stand it up); (ii) I find the velcro closure inconvenient for one-handed disposal while driving; (iii) It is made in a way that the rim (because of the "hinge" for the cover) does not readily accommodate the use of garbage bags; and (iv) despite the weighted bottom, this really would work better with some way of attaching to the center console.
customer_reviews.author: A Thinker and Tinkerer

customer_reviews.title: great car trash container
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash container for my van. It helps to keep it cleaned up, especially with different drivers. It's weighted so it won't tip over and it's covered, but easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews have done a good job pointing out the best and worst features
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews have done a good job pointing out the best and worst features. Just be sure to check the dimensions. I was expecting something larger. The description is "large" after all. It is however the size of an insulated lunchbox. A bottle six pack would fill it completely, just for size reference. I bought it because my wife collects a disturbing amount of litter in her car from eating breakfast and lunch on the go. It won't work for her, but it's perfect for me. I like that it's waterproof and fastens by velcro so you can open/close it with one hand. Magnets would have probably been better though.
customer_reviews.author: AmznRvw

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We ordered another one for my husbands truck. Great product, and size. We love the weighted bottom so it doesn’t tip over or slide. Makes it really easy to keep track of straw papers and others trash. 😊
customer_reviews.author: BleuEyes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great looking in the vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This is really well designed and looks good. Nice roomy size and super functional, with lid, pocket and leak proof liner that can be easily emptied.
customer_reviews.author: SLF

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Great little car garbage can has Velcro on the bottom keeps it in place very easy to put together overall exactly what I was looking for for my car
customer_reviews.author: HSZUlisse

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! It's weighted enough that it doesn't move from where you set it. It has Velcro on the bottom, but it doesn't stick well on my interior. It doesn't matter though as it doesn't move. The only thing I don't like is that I wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Great trash bin
customer_reviews.text: OK - yes, I'm a car slob. But I'm trying to change my ways. Years ago, I had a standup trash bag that worked great but the hubby got custody in the divorce. Went through countless ineffective trash bins that were too small to hold much, didn't stand up, rolled all over the place, and leaked. I've finally found a good one. With a lid that closes it off. Don't know if it leaks or not, but seems sturdy and well built so probably won't (don't want to find out). Like the weighted bottom too - stays where you put it.
customer_reviews.author: Adobe Gardener

customer_reviews.title: I have no doubt it will work well, from ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no doubt it will work well, from the looks of it. One thing that puzzles me is why the weight (that is supposed to keep it upright) is separate from the basket; I had expected it to be sewn into the bottom. We might have to put it into the basket as the first thing in, and then be careful not to throw it away with the trash. Right now I stashed the weight in the side pocket. I'm hoping the Velcro will hold onto the carpeting in the vehicle and keep it from moving or tipping. We''l be testing all this on a road trip RSN.
customer_reviews.author: Al Treder

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly behind the passenger seat so when I am driving I can throw trash away. It is perfectly weighted so it stands up and appears to be very well made. I am impressed with the product this far.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: No troubles concerning collapsing, as some have reported.
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. Haven't had any trouble with it collapsing. I use it on the floor of the backseat. I don't need the lid section, so I tucked it into the bin. Stays standing and holds a decent amount of trash. Quality is very good. I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T.

customer_reviews.title: Does not retain its box shape
customer_reviews.text: I can not recommend because this bin does not retain a box shape. There is no interior support to keep it open so it ends up like a collapsing bag and you have to open it each time in order to insert debris. Disappointed as otherwise it seemed well made and waterproof and weighted.
customer_reviews.author: Bocc1

customer_reviews.title: stays security in place
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car trash can. I did however take another reviewers idea and fortified the ends to keep it more securely open. It is a great size and has room for a grocery sack and my container of disinfectant wipes. I love how it doesn't shift on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri in AL

customer_reviews.title: A weighted trash container.
customer_reviews.text: It was weighted but not enough to keep it from tipping over. I would suggest more weight. Or weighted flaps to keep it in place. Otherwise it is a nice product. But I had to return it. It just wasn't going to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Trashy in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, nice & big, easy cleanup, leakproof just like it states, and holds a lot of trash. I weighted mine down with a bag of sand placed in the zippered compartment on the bottom. I drive a Touareg and it fits perfectly on the bump behind the front seats. I would have given it five stars but the sides eventually started to collapse. So then the top closes and it's not easy to toss something in while on the road. I bought a newer version for my dad that claims the sides won't collapse so we'll see... Still, I'd buy it again, obviously!
customer_reviews.author: thinkdammit

customer_reviews.title: Good trash container
customer_reviews.text: I line mine with a target bag so I don't have to clean out the litterbag. It's nice that it folds but it folds too easily, I wish it was a little more rigid but it works for us. I will say that I got this 2 days before taking a 1500 mile trip with 2 boys in the back seat with the litterbag so my opinion may change when we don't have 2 backpacks full of stuff to keep the kids occupied on the trip constantly falling on the litterbag folding it up. It has been nice not having trash handed to me every few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Robichaud

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I had read the reviews about the size, so I knew it would not be large. It's working well for me. I drive a lot, but typically alone or with one teen. It captures all the random papers and wrappers and my car has been noticeably cleaner since I got it. I empty it every 2-3 days. Love that it's lined.. in case something spills and really like the cover that keeps trash from being visible. The Velcro on the bottom keeps it in place. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: jhinva

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to the car
customer_reviews.text: This does everything a car trash bag should do. It Velcros to the floor so it doesn't move around, it contains any liquid or damp trash if it gets in there, it collapses for easy storage, and it holds a surprising amount of stuff. It's certainly better than my previous grocery store bag and throw it in the back seat approaches. I have a 2012 Sonic and put it in the back between the two seats, but in such a way that I don't have to turn around and look at it in case I'm putting a fast food wrapper in there or something.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing about this trash can is that is does not come with a strap to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: darlene roberson

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job.....it's a little different than the 2 smaller models I have in that this unit doesn't have the metal frame that snaps into place on the top rim. So this trash can doesn't stay totally square but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: R E

customer_reviews.title: Needs a rigid frame to avoid collapse but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: Works fair but constantly collapses. I had to make a wire frame from heavy wire to place inside the top of the stand to keep the sides from collapsing. With my improvised wire frame, it works pretty well. It is large enough to hold a reasonable quantity of trash. It is also the right size to use grocery type bags as liners.
customer_reviews.author: Carlisle, PA

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: Too small, but also too awkwardly sized to fit anywhere in a regular car. Also tips over super easy cause it's top heavy. And leaks all over if you've got any liquid in it. And the lid doesn't really stay closed so when it does tip over, the trash just falls right out.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Fallen in love with it!
customer_reviews.text: This little trash can is awesome. It's never fallen over - or attempted to - and holds way more than we expected. We put grocery bags in it to make for easier emptying, though.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little trash can
customer_reviews.text: We've had this trash can for a few years and just ordered another for our second car. We love them. Totally leakproof, so we can put liquids in without worry. The weight in the bottom is helpful so it doesn't slide all over the floor. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaly

customer_reviews.title: Complete satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Great trash bin for car. Weighted so it doesn't slide around but also not fixed in place so we can put it wherever we want. Has kid if we need it but kid folds down behind so it's unobtrusiv, easy to access and to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Walter S. Early

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Auto trash container
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The mesh pouch holds my disabled placard but most anything like maps (if you still use one and not GPS) or napkins will fit. The inside is large enough that a square box of tissues fit nicely still leaving room for trash. The lid closes to keep the unsightly trash out of view but is held with only velcro for easy access. If you have several kids it may not be large enough. We are a family of 2 and it is more than adequate. If we obtain another vehicle I will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Car’s best clean buddy
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can is the perfect size. The weighted section is below in a separate place so it is clear of the garbage. My husband has looked a long time for a good replacement and he has finally found it.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Really glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: I've never seen a good wastebasket solution in a car before this. The weighted bottom (removable), the lining, the velcro, the large capacity, and lid to hide the mess make this a really nice product. I've been dealing with a crappy one for ages that often tipped over and didn't hide the mess at all... This should fit in anyone's car, though for smaller models it might have to sit in the rear passenger legspace until the car fills up with people, then it would have to go to the trunk I imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: stay put and seals well
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can for auto or RV. Stays in place and does not leak well made product. My 4th from this maker and am well satisfied
customer_reviews.author: pillroller73

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and somewhat large and very stable
customer_reviews.text: Liked this so much in spouses car that I got one for myself. It’s not a dinky little bag. This is a rather large, very sturdy, weighted trash container. It does not tip over.
customer_reviews.author: judgejon

customer_reviews.title: It can hold quite a bit which is great but if it's not completely fill it folds in ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tested the leakproof quality, so my rating is only about how it's holding up to trash in the car. It can hold quite a bit which is great but if it's not completely fill it folds in on the sides which can be annoying because you have to pull open the sides most times.
customer_reviews.author: L.O.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought to put between my console for tissue box, umbrella, and more. Love it. Stays in place and is just the right size for all my stuff. Looks nice and came at a great price. Not using it for anything wet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Geddes

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting this to be a bit more sturdy in the sense of standing up and staying open ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be a bit more sturdy in the sense of standing up and staying open by itself. While the material and construction seems very durable and certainly waterproof on the inside it is missing a flat piece on the bottom that would help it stay open better. I just cut out a piece of cardboard and added it to the pocket for the weighted bean bag, which helped. Still, not as super practical as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mariandl

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but not that big
customer_reviews.text: I gave it four stars because of the size description as "XLarge" and the price. The quality is good, the walls are sturdy, there is a zipper compartment under neath to insert the bead bag that stabilizes it. I figured that out myself. The velcro strips underneath do not work in my Sienna mini van. I will keep it as it will do the job of keeping backseat neat with kids having a place to throw their trash, but in my opinion it is not worth the $19 for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Auto Weighted Trash Bin
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bin, except if you have a floor liner that is on the hump in the back. Then it has a tendency to slide. Also, you'll have to keep opening the bin until it stays open on itself (stays closed from being packed so long). Good size, built sturdily.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B. D. Kensek

customer_reviews.title: Trash stays in it
customer_reviews.text: The weight and the velcro strips on the bottom hold it upright and it doesn't tip over. This was a must for us and this one works well. It is large enough for a car trash can as long as you're not having a big party in your car.
customer_reviews.author: philetus

customer_reviews.title: Great car trash can
customer_reviews.text: Great car trash can. I travel 6-10 hours a day, so I live in my car. I been looking for a good small garbage can for my car. This one fits the bill. Well made, water proof, easy to clean if stuff does leak out into the trash can. The weight is good to keep it in place AND to help when your dumping it out. Great little trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: XL? What XL?
customer_reviews.text: Double check those measurements, it's not as big as an average shopping plastic bag- my previous trash container. Though this is far nicer looking. It certainly looks bigger in the picture. Not that I'm looking to drive around with a week's worth of garbage in my truck. That said, it does have the weight on the bottom which keeps it standing up (very nice!) and a velcro top and a side mesh pouch for... Things you want to keep near your garbage I guess.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for your car but ....
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag but it doesn't stay open when it is empty. I always have to keep a red solo cup at the bottom to keep it propped open. I drive a Honda Pilot. It fits perfectly right behind the center console on the rear passenger floor. It holds a nice amount and it doesn't leak. I hate people who litter so I think everyone needs one of these in their cars. I empty it when I fill up my car with gas. It will hold a week's worth of trash.
customer_reviews.author: PatO2098

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit-good quality
customer_reviews.text: My personal preference was for a litter bag that would be big enough for normal "in the car type junk", such as papers, water bottles and wrappers but not to large that it took up a lot of room. This bag is the perfect size and I have it sitting on the rear floor right behind the center console. The quality of this bag is top notch with a waterproof liner that should prevent any leaks. I'm glad I bought this and will be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: PEBO

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I really like this trash stand. It does exactly what I need it to do, and that is keep my car trash in one neat spot until I am able to empty it. I have to admit I think it is ridiculous to call it extra large; it is not. Therefore my 4 star rating instead of 5, because although I like it, in my opinion, it should be labeled a size small. However, surprisingly it holds more trash than I thought it could. I drive a minivan and have a family and so far, it fits our needs perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: slynndie

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact and stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact and stays put. I got this to use to hold items in my new car, which has very little storage space in the doors. This item is small, but holds a lot of stuff. I like that it has a cover that I can close. I also like that I can tuck it under the passenger side of the dash - it is black, like the carpet so it isn't readily visible to someone looking into the car.
customer_reviews.author: Cynindenver

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This works well for us. We keep it on the floor in the middle of the backseat area so we can reach it easily. We definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TCGram

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a trash can for our new CRV and wanted something that wouldn't be in the way and wouldn't turn over. This has been great so far. We put it right behind the console. After reading the reviews, I did add cardboard to the sides that weren't stiff enough. It doesn't seem to stick to the carpet with the velcro but the weighted bottom keeps it from turning over anyway. Seems over-priced but still happy with my purchase. If it gets dirty, I just wipe it out after emptying.
customer_reviews.author: NellyGirl

customer_reviews.title: A place for trash and has a lot of room but slips around in the car and the sides collapse
customer_reviews.text: Well, I basically said it in the description. I bought a roll of 4 gal. bags that I keep in my door and this keeps my van tidy. It doesn't stay in place, though, the velcro doesn't stick to my carpet and the sand isn't enough weight. The sides also collapse in. Both of these can be fixed (something heavy in the bottom and cardboard inserts) but shouldn't Talus do this, not the consumer? It has more room than it looks like it has.
customer_reviews.author: L Reisert

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it and only complaint is it doesn’t stay open for easy access without modifications
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: Good Item just as described
customer_reviews.text: Good Item just as described. The bottom is weighted just the right amount, easy to move around but stays up-right. I can pick it up and easily move it to the back of my van for the kids or keep it up front for me. The bottom has some velcro-like area that helps it keep still. Shipping was super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional and handy
customer_reviews.text: Hugely helpful for people who use the car a lot and can't always find a trash. Bathroom sized trash bags fit as well as shopping bags. Great for the end of road trips when you just want to grab your trash and toss it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great item, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was "LEAK PROOF" It definitely is not leak proof. This broke within the first week. A piece of cardboard is at the bottom to keep it flat but that bent super quick. It does not keep it's shape.I bought the XLarge and it wasn't as big as I thought it would be. If you put a bottle in standing up it would not close all the way. I don't recommend purchasing. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids in minivan!
customer_reviews.text: Very glad we got this for a long trip! And even more happy to have for everyday. I was always one with papers and little things cluttering my cup holders and throwing trash on the floor and now that I have this my car stays clean! It is weighted down too so does not fall over or move when you turn or go over bumps. My son can even toss his trash from sitting in his car seat! Wish I had this sooner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Myra Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Falls over!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly with a plastic grocery bag but the sides tend to cave in when it is not full of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nice trash bin
customer_reviews.text: Love my new trash bin for my new car. It is weighted down so it stays where I put it.
customer_reviews.author: ncgrits

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Product
customer_reviews.text: At first glance it's exactly what I wanted, however after putting in the vehicle I found that it wanted to fold in at the top. I did what others before me suggested and cut out some stiff cardboard and inserted on the sides and in the bottome. Mfg should consider doing this before shipping, I'm thinking it would be a great improvement to their product overall. I'm now very happy with the item!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: quality has gone down which means it's not waterfroof as previous one was
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these several years ago and it worked well in my minvan. The old one is still good and leakproof. However the new one came with a different waterpfoof liner which is too flimsy & too short. The first time it was used it leaked and it was because the seam on the bottom separated. Now I have to use a real leeak proof bag as a liner.
customer_reviews.author: lafayette cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I started using the item, seemed somewhat decent. The four sides are not fixed in place like my last trash container was, too flexible for my liking. After using for about a week or so, the stiffener (seems like a piece of plastic) broke in half, allowing the container to pretty much collapse on to itself.
customer_reviews.author: D. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, doesn't tip over. I use it all day and it never over flows. It does not tip over. It has a weighted bean bag at the bottom that is removable and it does its job well. I just line it each time with a plastic grocery bag since it grosses me out to just put trash in it and reuse without a bag.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Wish it stood up on its own more easily
customer_reviews.text: Not a great product........it does NOT stand easily on its own (the four walls of the litter basket). Makes it difficult to throw trash into it without working at it. And, its hardly 'extra large.' I would hate to see the size of their S, M and L litter baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon consumer from Florida

customer_reviews.title: The product was delivered on time with no damages to ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time with no damages to the box BUT the product itself had a piece of scotch tape inside that I found strange so I lifted it up and found it was holding together a large hole. After that I examined it more and found an even larger hole on the side of the product. Both were inside defeating the whole purpose of it being WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.author: Dayex2

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find anything like this in the stores in my area and I'm glad I took a chance and ordered it. It's perfect for my vehicle, sits nicely on the floor and holds quite a bit more than one of those plastic bags that hang awkwardly on a handle or knob. The grandkids think it's cool that they have something to throw their stuff in and now the trash ends up here instead of on the floor. It's well made and a good value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: J. James

customer_reviews.title: When the lid is closed it still has huge gaps ...
customer_reviews.text: When the lid is closed it still has huge gaps on both sides. And, you have to connect with velcro. If your wanting ease of tossing something away check out the High road stable mate large trash can that has support at the top and bottom with a magnet lid. Its also bigger and the price is almost the same as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: xl ????
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice well made bag, But even the most optimistic person could not describe this bag a XL, This is a small bag, I think I will be using this bag as a "cold bag" a little ice couple of cans or bottel it would be good for a short time. It folds nicely and can be slipped under a seat when not in use. But I will now be looking for a real xl bag that I can use as a catch all
customer_reviews.author: Eoghan Rua

customer_reviews.title: It stays put
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed. It doesn’t move. I keep it on the passenger side where the feet go. It’s small enough that it doesn’t bother the passenger. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nisse Lee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was the world's worst about having a filthy car! I recently purchased this litterbag and 2 High Road XL organizers and now I have the most immaculate car around! With 2 sons (3&4)I was always ending up with leaky sippy cups on my floor mats. Now, we throw all of our trash in it, as well as, plates, cups, and anything else that has crumbs, food, drinks, etc. that used to clutter my car! At the end of each day when we get home, I simply grab the litterbag and empty it in the household trash and rinse it out. It's completely leak proof! The velcro at the bottom ensures that it doesn't flip over...LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected an XL trash can to be larger. It is about the size of a shoe box. Having 3 kids 4 and under we make a lot of trash so I was worried it would be to small. So far it has worked perfectly. I don't want to stick Velcro to the car so thankfully the weight has held it in place well enough. Thinking about buying another one to keep in the back so we don't have to pass trash around the van.
customer_reviews.author: lhb

customer_reviews.title: Trash Can!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, stays put, easy to clean! The size is prefect for what I needed. Imagine a gallon jug of milk sitting inside it, that's about the capacity it holds, maybe a little more really. The inside lining is easy to clean and wipe off if anything sticky goes inside and the velcro bottom keeps it in place on the floor of my car so it does not fly around when I take corners and on ramps at 100mph.
customer_reviews.author: D. Needham

customer_reviews.title: Large size is just right!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a bit of trouble locating a trash can that seemed to fit the space above the transmission hump in my F-150 and this unt fits the bill. This appears to be a well constructed unit and the velcro on the bottom helps hold it to the floor mat when the small weight is inserted n the bottom compartment. After using it for a month+, I'd say overall, I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my Dodge pu
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my Dodge pu. The small version would have been to small. Glad I measured first. Quality looks good and like the waterproof liner and lid to cover the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: From the MInd of Bob
customer_reviews.text: I use to just use the bag from the gas station/convienance store to throw my trash in, but it won't stay on the emergency brake handle or stay open. But this trash stand stays open, stays put and is easy to throw stuff into it without missing. It takes liquids well. Putting a bag in it as a liner for easy clean out is a thought...but it takes away from it's coolness factor.
customer_reviews.author: From the mind of Bob

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Rather than a garbage can we use it to keep treats in as we travel. I have 2 now.
customer_reviews.author: Bronco Babe

customer_reviews.title: Set behind center console in rear seating area
customer_reviews.text: Had smaller model for my Silverado placing it behind the center console where diver or front passenger can reach slightly backward to deposit trash. This model is for our Enclave and is larger. Works great, is partially hidden behind the middle console, stays upright, has a lid if we want to cover the trash and is lined with easily cleaned plastic interior.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Ellisor

customer_reviews.title: Bought One for Each Vehicle
customer_reviews.text: We like it well enough that we bought a second one for my wife's car. Particularly like the weighted bottom that keeps it from turning over. 1/6/2018: Have bought a third one now... :)
customer_reviews.author: Jim Eoff

customer_reviews.title: The best car trashcan I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best car trashcan I've tried to date. Even when full the sandbag in the bottom keeps the box from tipping and dumping trash all over the floor. Being waterproof has also proven to be helpful during long trips. I've been so happy with this unit that I've purchased additional ones for my wife and family's cars.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Fits in the spot available in our Kia Rondo. Holds enough stuff for a days trip line it with a bag from the store makes it easy to clean out. I just wish the sides had a wire frame to. When empty the weight of the cover folds the unit into a triangle shape. Which allows room to pass from one rear seat to the other easier so I guess that's a good thing. Thank you purchasing from Amazon is a snap.
customer_reviews.author: R. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Okay container, but folds up at times
customer_reviews.text: I had a rigid trash container in my former vehicle and thought this one would work well in my new CR-V. It fits just fine and the waterproof lining is a plus, but the trash container tends to collapse if there is anything pressing on it from behind. You might be able to make it more rigid by adding some wood supports on each side, but I think it's simpler to look for a small trash container.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnygee

customer_reviews.title: Good accessory for your vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Great size and definitely leak proof. I like that it fits comfortable and out of the way for my two children in the back seat. The weights are a nice touch .
customer_reviews.author: benjamin

customer_reviews.title: This is a real good trash can!
customer_reviews.text: The good part is that the odors stay inside and the kid cannot step on the plastic bag and break it. I like it so far. But even though there are velcros in the bottom, they stick to only small parts of the carpet in the car and so the bag topples over sometimes. But thanks to the sand bag, it stays put most of the time. And its plenty big infact!
customer_reviews.author: S. Krishna

customer_reviews.title: Small....
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at measurements closer as it is very small... more like a 6 pack cooler. And the weighted insert is not very heavy but I’m keeping it will just have to empty more often.
customer_reviews.author: angela strodel

customer_reviews.title: It is a good size for both our van & our Rav4
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased. It is a good size for both our van & our Rav4. I like that it has a cover & it is weighted & has velcro on the bottom so it stays put.
customer_reviews.author: grama sue

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my new car clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love having a trash container in my car so I can keep my car as neat as possible (although this was a new development when I bought a new car...my last one was never clean!). This is a good size- it fits on that small raised portion of the floor behind the center console. A plastic grocery bag fits perfectly in it and makes it easy to empty. There are also pockets to store extra bags. The only negative is that when it's empty, one of the long sides flops over so I have to reach around and make sure I'm tossing things in the container as opposed to in front of it. But that's minor and picky.
customer_reviews.author: pantsarella

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Your Car Clean
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is perfect for my vehicle. Because it is weighted, it stays put. It does not tip over, so there is NEVER any trash strewn around the floor of my back seat. And it's big enough to hold a decent amount of trash before you have to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a Good size!
customer_reviews.text: This trash bag is great for my RV- I actually inserted an even taller Ikea collapsible shoe bag (also black) into this one to make a sturdy, floor trash can that won't slide around on the road. I line it with grocery size plastic bags. It holds a lot and it doesn't budge, even when I take the turns a little fast!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

product_meta.title: High Road TrashStand Weighted Car Trash Can with Lid and Leakproof Lining
feature_bullets: TIP-RESISTANT CAR TRASH CAN WITH WEIGHTED BASE - hard braking and tight turns won't tip the High Road TrashStand, with its bottom weight and grip strips you can step on the gas without toppling the trash
LEAKPROOF GARBAGE BIN TAKES WET OR DRY CAR TRASH - we've improved our TrashStand by adding a removable leakproof inner liner - no bags or extra liners needed
HINGED COVER AND MESH STORAGE POCKET – the hard cover keeps unsightly car trash hidden from view, a wide front pocket offers extra storage for tissues, sanitizer and wipes
UNIVERSAL SIZE FITS LARGE AND SMALL VEHICLES - 2 gallon capacity garbage bin has a rectangular shape to fit in large or smaller autos in the front, back and trunk areas
DURABLE MATERIALS AND CONSTRUCTION - designed with quality materials and built to last - based in Portland Maine, High Road has designed and developed problem-solving car organizers since 1990

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars769 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
